title: Majutsushi Orphen: Revenge
alternative_title: Orphen 2: Revenge, Sorcerous Stabber Orphen Revenge, 魔術士オーフェンRevenge
description: Orphen and his gang has set out on an all new adventure with many monsters to battle and no peace and quiet. But a new friend has joined the group. Her name Lycorus who was sent to find Orphen. Many mysterious shadows are overhanging over head.
